sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PmConsoleAggregationHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PmConsoleAggregationHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PmConsoleAggregationHelper = Class.create();
PmConsoleAggregationHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'PmConsoleAggregationHelper'
};

PmConsoleAggregationHelper.maxValue = function(table, column, filterQuery) {
    //gs.info("Into PmConsoleAggregationHelper.maxValue: " + table + " - " + column + " - " + filterQuery);
    var max = new GlideAggregate(table);
    max.addAggregate('MAX', column);
    max.addEncodedQuery(filterQuery);
    max.setGroup(false);
    max.query();
    //gs.info("maxValue query: " + max.getEncodedQuery());
    var agg = 0;
    if (max.next()) {
        var maxValue = max.getAggregate('MAX', column);
        if(JSUtil.notNil(maxValue))
            agg = parseInt(maxValue);
    }
    //gs.info("maxValue: " + agg);
    return agg;
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-05-25 00:26:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>462a5e9e9f231200598a5bb0657fcf1f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PmConsoleAggregationHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_462a5e9e9f231200598a5bb0657fcf1f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-05-25 03:59:13</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>800</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
